channel.title: PI ip changer button on client
channel.description: hey guys im almost done setting up my server but the problem is my ip keeps changing so i want to put an ip changer button on top of the client so i can just tell people on the readme to tell if the ip wont work just change it so can someone give me an tutorial of adding an ip button?

item.title: PI ip changer button on client
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

What about this?

chatTextDrawingArea.method389(true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "Server IP: " + server + ((loginScreenCursorPos == 2) & (loopCycle % 40 < 20) ? "@xxx@|" : ""), j); j += 15;

Read full topic
item.source: PI ip changer button on client
